page.title: 01General. Kylerhea.
page.content: In Kylerhea there is a river.There are some hills aswell.There is a population of 5 people.There is a boat house at the pier.From Kylerhea you can see Glenelg .There is a private ferry that crosses from Glenelg to Kylerhea.There is a very steep hill to go down if you go by car to Kylerhea. Sometimes if you are lucky you can see some red deer.There are hills surrounding Kylerhea apart from one part which is sea.There are lots of sheep on the hills and there are lots of wild animals.There is an old school and school house in Kylerhea but the school is closed.Kylerhea has had electricity for only six years. Some people have crofts and own a few animals like sheep and cows.
